/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape below. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades adorned with red lanterns that add a splash of color to the scene. These lanterns hang from the buildings, swaying gently in the breeze, adding a touch of tradition to the modern cityscape. The street itself is a hive of activity with cars and buses moving along it, their headlights and taillights creating streaks of light that cut through the scene. The image is bathed in the soft glow of streetlights, their light reflecting off the pavement and adding depth to the scene. This image is a snapshot of life in Beijing, capturing the blend of tradition and modernity that characterizes the city.
